verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--'tumi ki artha kara, tāhā āge śuni'
pāche āmi kariba artha, yebā kichu jāni'

synonyms: prabhu kahe—the Lord said; tumi—you; ki—what; artha—meaning; kara—do; tāhā—that; āge—first of all; śuni'-hearing; pāche—after that; āmi—I; kariba—shall do; artha—meaning; yebā—whatever; kichu—something; jāni—I know.
translation: The Lord replied, "First let Me hear your explanation. After that, I shall try to explain what little I know."
